plot: This historical drama recounts the revolt of the Flemish farmers against the armies of the French Republic between 1798 and 1799.
title: Brigands voor outer en heerd
plot_es: This historical drama recounts the revolt of the Flemish farmers against the armies of the French Republic between 1798 and 1799.
plot_en: This historical drama recounts the revolt of the Flemish farmers against the armies of the French Republic between 1798 and 1799.
